Other Functions.html#/s:F16MapboxNavigat.name: RouteControllerMinimumDistanceForMediumAlert(identifier:)
Other Functions.html#/s:F16MapboxNavigat.abstract: Returns the appropriate mediium AlertLevel distance for a given MBDirectionsProfileIdentifier.

Other Functions.html#/s:F16MapboxNavigat.name: RouteControllerMinimumDistanceForHighAlert(identifier:)
Other Functions.html#/s:F16MapboxNavigat.abstract: Returns a the appropriate high AlertLevel distance for a given MBDirectionsProfileIdentifier.

Other Functions.html#/s:F16MapboxNavigat.name: wrap(_:min:max:)
Other Functions.html#/s:F16MapboxNavigat.abstract: Returns a normalized number given min and max bounds.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: MaxSecondsSpentTravelingAwayFromStartOfRoute
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Maximum number of seconds the user can travel away from the start of the route before rerouting occurs

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerDeadReckoningTimeInterval
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: When calculating whether or not the user is on the route, we look where the user will be given their speed and this variable.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerHighAlertInterval
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Number of seconds left on step when a high alert is emitted.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerManeuverZoneRadius
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Radius in meters the user must enter to count as completing a step. One of two heuristics used to know when a user completes a step, see RouteControllerMaximumAllowedDegreeOffsetForTurnCompletion.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMaxManipulatedCourseAngle
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Maximum angle the user puck will be rotated when snapping the user’s course to the route line.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMaximumAllowedDegreeOffsetForTurnCompletion
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Threshold user must be in within to count as completing a step. One of two heuristics used to know when a user completes a step, see RouteControllerManeuverZoneRadius.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMaximumDistanceBeforeRecalculating
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Maximum number of meters the user can travel away from step before RouteControllerShouldReroute is emitted.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMediumAlertInterval
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Number of seconds left on step when a medium alert is emitted.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMinimumDistanceForHighAlertCycling
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Distance in meters for the minimum length of a step for giving a high alert while using MBDirectionsProfileIdentifierCycling.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMinimumDistanceForHighAlertDriving
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Distance in meters for the minimum length of a step for giving a high alert while using MBDirectionsProfileIdentifierAutomobile or MBDirectionsProfileIdentifierAutomobileAvoidingTraffic.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMinimumDistanceForHighAlertWalking
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Distance in meters for the minimum length of a step for giving a high alert while using MBDirectionsProfileIdentifierWalking.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMinimumDistanceForMediumAlertCycling
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Distance in meters for the minimum length of a step for giving a medium alert while using MBDirectionsProfileIdentifierCycling.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMinimumDistanceForMediumAlertDriving
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Distance in meters for the minimum length of a step for giving a medium alert while using MBDirectionsProfileIdentifierAutomobile or MBDirectionsProfileIdentifierAutomobileAvoidingTraffic.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerMinimumDistanceForMediumAlertWalking
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Distance in meters for the minimum length of a step for giving a medium alert while using MBDirectionsProfileIdentifierWalking.

Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerUserLocationSnappingDistance
Configuration.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Accepted deviation excluding horizontal accuracy before the user is considered to be off route.

UI Components.html#/s:C16MapboxNavigatio.name: Button
UI Components.html#/s:C16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: MBButton sets the tintColor according to the style.

UI Components.html#/s:C16MapboxNavigatio.name: HighlightedButton
UI Components.html#/s:C16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: MBHighlightedButton sets the button’s titleColor for normal control state

Enums/AlertLevel.html#/s:FO16MapboxNavig.name: low
Enums/AlertLevel.html#/s:FO16MapboxNavig.abstract: The user has recently completed a step.

Enums/AlertLevel.html#/s:FO16MapboxNavig.name: high
Enums/AlertLevel.html#/s:FO16MapboxNavig.abstract: The user is at or very close to the maneuver point

Enums/AlertLevel.html.name: AlertLevel
Enums/AlertLevel.html.abstract: An AlertLevel indicates the user’s general progress toward a step’s maneuver point. A change to the current alert level is often an opportunity to present the user with a visual or voice notification about the upcoming maneuver.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerAlertLevelDidChange
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Emitted when the alert level changes. This indicates the user should be notified about the upcoming maneuver.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerAlertLevelDidChangeNotificationDistanceToEndOfManeuverKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the user’s snapped distance to the end of the maneuver (CLLocationDistance) from a RouteControllerAlertLevelDidChange notification’s userInfo dictionary

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerAlertLevelDidChangeNotificationRouteProgressKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the RouteProgress object from a RouteControllerAlertLevelDidChange notification’s userInfo dictionary

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerDidFailToReroute
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Emitted after the user has gone offroute but the RouteController failed to reroute.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerDidReroute
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Emitted after the user has gone offroute and the RouteController rerouted.

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerNotificationErrorKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the error from a RouteControllerDidFailToReroute notification’s userInfo dictionary

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerNotificationLocationKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the user’s current CLLocation from a RouteControllerWillReroute notification’s userInfo dictionary

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerNotificationRouteKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the newly rerouted Route from a RouteControllerDidReroute notification’s userInfo dictionary

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerProgressDidChange
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Emitted when the user moves along the route

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerProgressDidChangeNotificationLocationKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the CLLocation object from a RouteControllerProgressDidChange notification’s userInfo dictionary

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerProgressDidChangeNotificationProgressKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the RouteProgress object from a RouteControllerProgressDidChange notification’s userInfo dictionary

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerProgressDidChangeNotificationSecondsRemainingOnStepKey
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Key used for accessing the number of seconds left on a step (Double) from a RouteControllerProgressDidChange notification’s userInfo dictionary

Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.name: RouteControllerWillReroute
Notifications.html#/s:v16MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Emitted when the user has gone offroute and the RouteController is about to reroute.

Classes/Style.html#/s:vC16MapboxNavigati.name: cellTitleLabelFont

Classes/Style.html#/s:vC16MapboxNavigati.name: wayNameTextColor

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.name: distanceTraveled
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.abstract: Returns distance user has traveled along current step.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.name: userDistanceToManeuverLocation
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.abstract: Returns distance from user to end of step.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.name: distanceRemaining
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.abstract: Total distance in meters remaining on current stpe

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.name: fractionTraveled
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.abstract: Number between 0 and 1 representing fraction of current step traveled

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.name: durationRemaining
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:vC16Ma.abstract: Number of seconds remaining on current step

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.name: distanceTraveled
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.abstract: Total distance traveled in meters along current leg

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.name: durationRemaining
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.abstract: Duration remaining in seconds on current leg

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.name: fractionTraveled
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.abstract: Number between 0 and 1 representing how far along the current leg the user has traveled.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.name: stepBefore(_:)
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.abstract: Returns the RouteStep before a given step. Returns nil if there is no step prior.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.name: stepAfter(_:)
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.abstract: Returns the RouteStep after a given step. Returns nil if there is not a step after.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.name: currentStep
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.abstract: Returns the current RouteStep for the leg the user is on.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.name: isCurrentStep(_:)
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:FC16Map.abstract: Return bool whether step provided is the current RouteStep the user is on.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.name: nearbyCoordinates
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/s:vC16Map.abstract: Returns an array of CLLocationCoordinate2D of the prior, current and upcoming step geometry

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: currentLeg
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: If waypoints are provided in the Route, this will contain which leg the user is on.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: distanceTraveled
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: Total distance traveled by user along all legs.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: fractionTraveled
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: Number between 0 and 1 representing how far along the Route the user has traveled.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: distanceRemaining
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: Total distance remaining in meters along route.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.name: remainingWaypoints
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:vC16Mapbox.abstract: Number of waypoints remaining on the current route

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called immediately before the route controller calculates a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called immediately after the route controller receives a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when the route controller fails to receive a new route.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.name: directions
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.abstract: The Directions object used to create the route.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.name: routeProgress
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.abstract: Details about the user’s progress along the current route, leg, and step.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.name: snapsUserLocationAnnotationToRoute
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:vC16Mapb.abstract: If true, the user puck is snapped to closest location on the route.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.name: resume()
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.abstract: Starts monitoring the user’s location along the route.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.name: suspendLocationUpdates()
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.abstract: Stops monitoring the user’s location along the route.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.name: userIsOnRoute(_:)
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:FC16Mapb.abstract: Given a users current location, returns a Boolean whether they are currently on the route.

Classes/RouteController.html.name: RouteController
Classes/RouteController.html.abstract: A RouteController tracks the user’s progress along a route, posting

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html.name: RouteControllerDelegate
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html.abstract: The RouteControllerDelegate class provides methods for responding to significant occasions during the user’s traversal of a route monitored by a RouteController.

Classes/RouteProgress.html.name: RouteProgress
Classes/RouteProgress.html.abstract: RouteProgress stores the user’s progress along a route.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html.name: RouteLegProgress
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html.abstract: RouteLegProgress stores the user’s progress along a route leg.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html.name: RouteStepProgress
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html.abstract: RouteStepProgress stores the user’s progress along a route step.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: isEnabled
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: A boolean value indicating whether instructions should be announced by voice or not.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: globalVoiceId
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: Forces Polly voice to always be of specified type. If not set, a localized voice will be used.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: instructionVoiceSpeedRate
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: SSML option which controls at which speed Polly instructions are read.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: instructionVoiceVolume
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: SSML option that specifies the voice loudness.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: regionType
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: regionType specifies what AWS region to use for Polly.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: playRerouteSound
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: If true, a noise indicating the user is going to be rerouted will play prior to rerouting.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: rerouteSoundPlayer
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: Sound to play prior to reroute. Inherits volume level from volume.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: bufferBetweenAnnouncements
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: Buffer time between announcements. After an announcement is given any announcement given within this TimeInterval will be suppressed.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.name: identityPoolId
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:vC1.abstract: identityPoolId is a required value for using AWS Polly voice instead of iOS’s built in AVSpeechSynthesizer.
